description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals...
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
====================================================================

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for the provision of accommodation services in Quebec City, Quebec, Canada.

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number**: WS4447121548-Doc4447144910
*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4447121548
*   **Publication Date**: March 15, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 3, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
*   **Amendment Date**: March 26, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: October 1, 2024

### Service Description

The Government of Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is seeking proposals for hospitality services in Quebec City. The services required are detailed in the Statement of Requirements annexed to this request for proposal (RFP).

### Evaluation Criteria

The RFP will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

### Trade Agreements

This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns related to this RFP, please contact:

Francois S. Martineau
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Document Access

The complete RFP package, including the Statement of Requirements, can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery website: https://discovery
